thread.section_title: Foreign and national political news and analysis - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Ryan to seek speakership if House GOP unifies behind him
thread.title_full: Ryan to seek speakership if House GOP unifies behind him - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Erica Werner, Ap Congressional Correspondent
title: Ryan to seek speakership if House GOP unifies behind him
text: Photo: Andrew Harnik, AP Rep. Paul Ryan, R- Wis., speaks at a news conference following a House Republican meeting, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, on Capitol Hill in Washington. Ryan told GOP lawmakers that he will run for speaker, but only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate, an ambitious bid to impose unity on a disordered and divided House. Rep. Paul Ryan, R- Wis., speaks at a news conference following a... WASHINGTON (AP) — Wisconsin Rep. Paul Ryan told GOP lawmakers late Tuesday that he will run for speaker, but only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate — an ambitious bid to impose unity on a disordered and divided House. Rep. Paul Ryan, R- Wis., speaks at a news conference following a House Republican meeting, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, on Capitol Hill in Washington. Ryan told GOP lawmakers that he will run for speaker, but only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate, an ambitious bid to impose unity on a disordered and divided House. Rep. Paul Ryan, R- Wis., speaks at a news conference following a... WASHINGTON (AP) — Wisconsin Rep. Paul Ryan told GOP lawmakers late Tuesday that he will run for speaker, but only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate — an ambitious bid to impose unity on a disordered and divided House.
